item.description:
What can be better Food, Music, Crafts, Friends, Fun, and.......... WHOOPIE PIES!

Let’s go check out the festival and see the sites and sounds of Dover-Foxcroft, Maine.  Last year there were over 20 vendors, and they even had a Gluten free baker.  They will have an entertainment schedule which will include: bands, cloggers, cheerleaders etc..... vendors will be selling their goods, and other food tents.  Don’t miss the Whoopie Pie eating contest!!!

So take a day trip to Maine and let's check out a great festival.

Cost: General admission $5.00 kids 10 and under are FREE, samples are .25 cents each.

Time: The event starts at 10:00 and runs until 4:00, and they will run it rain or shine.

Parking: There's 2 designated places for parking and a shuttle to take you to the festival.  See where to park on the link below.  For more information and directions check out their site at http://mainewhoopiepiefestival.com/directions/

**NOTE as per the above map, the restaurant Abel Blood's Pub is near the event, so I have put that address in the place as the event address.

We will only wait 15 minutes for you to arrive at the meeting place, if you can't find us come on in and find us. Remember the meetup phone number is:  978-304-2811. 

If you have not paid your dues this year, this event would be a good opportunity to do so. 

Remember to change your RSVP to an event if your plans change.  

So come on out spend the day with friends and your favorite whoopee pie.
Donna
item.how_to_find_us: I haven’t been here before, so let’s meet at the admissions gate.
item.name: Maine's Whoopie Pie Festival
